si.title: ජනාධිපතිවරණය
body_lines: අමාත්යවරයා මේ බව ප්රකාශ කළේ විශේෂ මාධ්ය සාකච්ඡාවක් අමතමින්.

en.title: Presidential election
body_lines: The Minister made this statement while addressing a special media briefing.

summary_lines: In a special media briefing, the Minister discussed the upcoming presidential election, emphasizing its importance for the nation's future direction.
